setup-worktree-unix: python3 -m venv venv || python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements/dev.txt || pip install -r requirements.txt
setup-worktree-windows: .\venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements\dev.txt || pip install -r requirements.txt
copy %ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\.env .env 2>nul || echo No .env file to copy
copy %ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\.env.local .env.local 2>nul || echo No .env.local file to copy
setup-worktree: echo 'Using generic fallback. For better support, define OS-specific scripts.'
